description: Sex and Submission is proud to present Vamp, our first high production original series about vampires. Episode 1 introduces some of the characters and shows how Grace (Kristina Rose) is seduced by the vampires and brought back to their lair where she is initiated into the world of the undead. This is beautifully shot in high definition with great acting and very hot BDSM sex!
title: Vamp Episode 1: A Fall From Grace
